# sendmail API (steuermachen.de)

The sendmail API can only be accessed via `HTTPS` and `POST`.

## URL
```
https://steuermachen.de/sendmail-api/
```

## Bearer Token
```

```

## Parameter
| Parameter | Type | Method | Details |
|-|-|-|-|
`to` | `string` | `POST` | **required**<br>Target email address
`subject` |  `string` |  `POST` | **required**<br>Subject from email
`message` |  `string` |  `POST` | **required**<br>This parameter can contain `HTML` code.
`version` |  `string` |  `GET` | **optional**<br>This will cause the API only showing the version.<br>It does not require a value, can be accessed without the bearer token and ignores the SSL check.

## Response
``` json
// if everything is fine
{
  "sendmail": true
}

// if the request was not over SSL
{
  "sendmail": false,
  "error": {
    "code": 403
    "message": "Forbidden - SSL required"
  }
}

// if the request was not with POST
{
  "sendmail": false,
  "error": {
    "code": 415
    "message": "Unsupported Media Type - only POST requests"
  }
}

// if the request is missing required parameter
{
  "sendmail": false,
  "error": {
    "code": 400
    "message": "Bad Request - one or more parameter is missing"
  }
}

// version parameter
{
  "version": "1.X.X"
}
```
